SQL Server Management Studio.title: WHERE
SQL Server Management Studio.description: Filters records based on a condition.

SQL Server Management Studio.title: LIKE
SQL Server Management Studio.description: Searches for a specified pattern in a column.
SQL Server Management Studio.code: SELECT * FROM table WHERE column LIKE '%value%';

SQL Server Management Studio.title: CASE
SQL Server Management Studio.code: SELECT column, CASE WHEN condition THEN result ELSE other END FROM table;

SQL Server Management Studio.title: GROUP BY
SQL Server Management Studio.description: Groups rows that have the same values.
SQL Server Management Studio.code: SELECT column, COUNT(*) FROM table GROUP BY column;

SQL Server Management Studio.title: ORDER BY
SQL Server Management Studio.code: SELECT * FROM table ORDER BY column ASC|DESC;

SQL Server Management Studio.title: JOIN
SQL Server Management Studio.description: Combines rows from two or more tables.
SQL Server Management Studio.code: SELECT * FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id;

SQL.title: UPDATE
SQL.code: UPDATE table SET col=val WHERE condition;
